title: Safari Park Tour
shorDes: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Safari Park, Gazipur, Safari Park Road, Sreepur, Bangladesh
longDes: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Safari Park is a trendy wildlife safari park at Gazipur in Bangladesh. It is located 52 kilometers from Dhaka city. Our well-behaved, English-speaking tour guide will be your guide for the whole day. He will pick you from selected places and drop you at the same places at the end of the trip. In Gazipur safari park, you can see several animals and birds like zebras, deer, bison, Macaws, hornbills, peacocks in addition to the carnivores like royal Bengal Tigers, white lions, elephants, Sambars, Maya deer, Chitra deer, monkeys, Hanuman, bear, gazelles, crocodiles during this ride. The Bangabandhu safari park also has a national history museum, an aquarium, a duck pond and a small butterfly enclosure open to visitors.

depAndRet.title:: Our guide will pick up you from selected places in Dhaka City

additionals.info1: You will receive a booking confirmation
additionals.info3: Most of the travelers can participate
additionals.info4: This is a private/group tour/activity operated by Travel Mate

childPolicy: Free up to 3 years with parents without a seat and food.
cancelPol: You can cancel before 72 hours of the tour for a full refund without a bank/payment fee and service cost.
